description: Write a function that validates a `webhook_url`. It must use 'https' and its hostname must NOT be a literal IP address. Example (Valid): is_valid_webhook_url("https://hooks.example.com") -> 1. Example (Bad Scheme): is_valid_webhook_url("http://hooks.example.com") -> 0. Example (Literal IP): is_valid_webhook_url("https://1.2.3.4") -> 0.
